about_the_game:
Recently, unwanted monsters have appeared in our vicinity, whose chaotic lifestyle has begun to cause harm and disrupt the lives of you and the inhabitants of nearby villages. These creatures constantly emit piercing screams, host parties with the most terrible music, and seem to have no understanding of good manners. It's time to teach them a lesson!

Dynamic Battles and Bosses:

Exciting battles with numerous enemies and epic clashes with mighty bosses await you. Each battle is a test of your skill and strength.

Cooperative Mode:

You can gather a team of friends or embark on an adventure alone. Cooperative gameplay adds new tactical possibilities, expands the gameplay, and creates team interaction.

Combinations and Abilities:

In addition to basic abilities, your character can perform various combinations of attacks and skills, adding depth to combat and allowing you to develop your unique strategies. But be careful, you can both help and harm your allies.

Base Building and Mini-Games:

The game offers opportunities for base construction and improvement to develop your capabilities and obtain additional resources. Additionally, mini-games add variety to the game world, allowing you to relax and compete with friends.

Roguelike Elements:

Levels for your adventures are randomly generated, providing a unique experience. Different monsters, treasures, and events on each level make your playthrough exciting and unpredictable. Make your enemies fear you!
